p: Flavourzyme (50°C, pH 6.7), dispase (55°C, pH 7.0), papain (50°C, pH 7.0), pepsin (32°C, pH 2.0), and alcalase (55°C, pH 10.0) were used to conduct enzymatic hydrolysis of M. oleifera seed protein for 30, 60, 120, 180, 240, 300, 360, and 420 min, and then the DPPH scavenging rate was determined. The results are shown in Figure 2.
